events.name: High-Intensity Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 5x30s sprints, Z2 recovery, cooldown. Focus on power output.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Tempo/Threshold Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Low cadence, 3x10min at threshold, Z2 recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Long Endurance Ride (INDOOR)
events.description:
Z2 ride, focus on endurance. Hydrate well.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Threshold/SS/Tempo Focus (INDOOR)
events.description:
Focus on threshold/SS, 90 min. Maintain intensity.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)
